author: Adrian Collins
description:
In case you missed it in our newsletter announcement, we are starting our YouTube channel afresh and taking a completely new approach. We’ve found what we think is a pretty awesome gap in the short fiction market: on screen narration. And, we’re going to be doing it with screen actors, bringing those extra layers of […]

The post Elevating short stories on YouTube: A Reputation for Prudence by Richard Swan (narrated by Luke Arnold) appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: Elevating short stories on YouTube: A Reputation for Prudence by Richard Swan (narrated by Luke Arnold)
